com.simsilica.ethereal.net

Class StateWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.ethereal.net.StateWriter

  • public class StateWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffers the state information, flushing it to real messages when it exceeds a certain message threshold.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxMessageSize

        public void setMaxMessageSize(int max)
        Sets the desired maximum message size. Typically the ideal situation would be to keep this under the MTU of the connection. By default, StateWriter estimates this as 1500 bytes. It can vary and there is no direct way to know. Set this to a really large value to avoid ever splitting messages.

      • getMaxMessageSize

        public int getMaxMessageSize()
